name: ICDEV Architect
description: System design, schema design, and technology selection. Runs ATLAS Architect and Trace phases for production-grade system architectures.

skills.name: Design Architecture
skills.description: Create a full system architecture document including components, data flow, API contracts, and deployment topology.

skills.name: Design Schema
skills.description: Design database schemas, API schemas, and data models with proper normalization and indexing strategies.

skills.name: Select Technology Stack
skills.description: Evaluate and recommend technology stack based on requirements, compliance needs, and GovCloud compatibility.

skills.name: Trace Dependencies
skills.description: Map component dependencies, API call chains, and data flows for impact analysis.
